item.title: When attack npc make it turn to you..[DELTA]
item.dc:creator: @Sup22211 Sup22211
item.description:
@Sup22211 wrote:

I need help doing this i made a method but for some reason it’s not working :

public void TurnNpcTo(int pointX, int pointY) {
FocusPointX = 2*pointX+1;
FocusPointY = 2*pointY+1;
    }

(This is in the player class) Any sugesstions how to use it/make it work Lol.
Now when i try to use it i use it like this : i open my client,java:

if(server.npcHandler.npcs[barrowsID].npcType == 2025){   //2025 Barrows man..
TurnNpcTo(absX, absY);
	}

am i using it in the right place? and should i use ‘absX’ and ‘absY’ to make it turn to me when i clicking it.

Read full topic
